chapter.title: Platforms
chapter.para: In this chapter we discuss different platform types from the basic Linux infrastructure. Furthermore, we provide the command line statements to install all the nodes in dmsat1.

A platform is a node or a group of nodes that implement a certain function. For example, 2 LDAP nodes and 2 LVS nodes, collaborate to provide the LDAP basic infra service in the dmsat1 Deployment zone.
